mapper.select: select studio_option as studioOption, studio_option_price as studioOptionPrice, studio_option_type as studioOptionType from studio_select where studio_no=#{studioNo} and studio_option_type=#{studioOptionType}
mapper.delete: delete from studio_select where studio_no=#{studioNo} and studio_option_type=#{studioType}
delete from studio_select where studio_no=#{studioNo} and studio_option_type=#{studioType} and studio_option=#{studioOption}
